gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Lakers 139, Pelicans 122
gameRecap.excerpt: The Lakers defeated the Pelicans, 139-122. The Lakers starting five all scored 20 points apiece, led by D'Angelo Russell (30 points, five assists), Austin Reaves (27 points), Rui Hachimura (21 points), LeBron James (21 points, 14 assists), and Anthony Davis (20 points, six assists). Zion Williamson (30 points, nine rebounds, five assists) and Brandon Ingram (22 points, seven rebounds, seven assists) led the Pelicans. The Lakers improve to 28-26 as the Pelicans move to 30-22.
